00019 template <class Base>
00020 class TViewExtenderCompBase: public Base, virtual public IViewExtender
00021 {
00022 public:
00023        typedef Base BaseClass;
00024 
00025        I_BEGIN_BASE_COMPONENT(TViewExtenderCompBase);
00026               I_REGISTER_INTERFACE(IViewExtender);
00027               I_ASSIGN(m_slaveExtenderCompPtr, "SlaveSceneExtender", "Scene extender will be used to provide background shapes", false, "SlaveSceneExtender");
00028               I_ASSIGN(m_sceneExtenderModeAttrPtr, "ViewExtenderMode", "Control how the view extender works:\n\t0 - combine slave with current shapes\n\t1 - use slave by direct calls only\n\t2 - use slave always and current shapes indirect only\n\t3 - use slave by direct calls only and current shapes indirect only", true, 0);
00029               I_ASSIGN_MULTI_0(m_idFiltersAttrPtr, "SceneIdFilters", "Optional scene ID filters allowing to ignore some scene providers", false);
00030        I_END_COMPONENT;
00031 
00032        TViewExtenderCompBase();
00033 
00034        // reimplemented (iqt2d::IViewExtender)
00035        virtual void AddItemsToScene(IViewProvider* providerPtr, int flags);
00036        virtual void RemoveItemsFromScene(IViewProvider* providerPtr);
00037 
00038 protected:
00039        enum ExtenderMode
00040        {
00041               EM_COMBINE,
00042               EM_SLAVE_DIRECT_ONLY,
00043               EM_OWN_SHAPES_INDIRECT,
00044               EM_SLAVE_DIRECT_ONLY_OWN_SHAPES_INDIRECT
00045        };
00046 
00047        typedef istd::TPointerVector<iview::IShape> Shapes;
00048        typedef QMap<IViewProvider*, Shapes> ShapesMap;
00049 
00050        bool IsViewIdSupported(int viewId) const;
00051        const ShapesMap& GetShapesMap() const;
00052 
00053        void UpdateAllViews();
00054 
00055        // abstract methods
00060        virtual void CreateShapes(int viewId, Shapes& result) = 0;
00061 
00062 private:
00063        ShapesMap m_shapesMap;
00064        bool m_isSlaveShown;
00065 
00066        I_REF(IViewExtender, m_slaveExtenderCompPtr);
00067        I_ATTR(int, m_sceneExtenderModeAttrPtr);
00068        I_MULTIATTR(int, m_idFiltersAttrPtr);
00069 
00070        istd::TDelPtr<i2d::ICalibration2d> m_viewCalibrationPtr;
00071 };

00078 :      m_isSlaveShown(false)

00083 // reimplemented (iqt2d::IViewExtender)
00084 
00085 template <class Base>
00086 void TViewExtenderCompBase<Base>::AddItemsToScene(IViewProvider* providerPtr, int flags)
00087 {
00088        Q_ASSERT(providerPtr != NULL);
00089 
00090        int viewId = providerPtr->GetViewId();
00091        iview::IShapeView* viewPtr = providerPtr->GetView();
00092 
00093        bool showOwnShapes = true;
00094        bool showSlaveShapes = true;
00095 
00096        switch (*m_sceneExtenderModeAttrPtr){
00097        case EM_SLAVE_DIRECT_ONLY:
00098               showSlaveShapes = ((flags & SF_DIRECT) != 0);
00099               break;
00100 
00101        case EM_OWN_SHAPES_INDIRECT:
00102               showOwnShapes = ((flags & SF_DIRECT) == 0);
00103               break;
00104 
00105        case EM_SLAVE_DIRECT_ONLY_OWN_SHAPES_INDIRECT:
00106               showOwnShapes = ((flags & SF_DIRECT) == 0);
00107               showSlaveShapes = ((flags & SF_DIRECT) != 0);
00108               break;
00109 
00110        default:
00111               break;
00112        };
00113 
00114 
00115        if (          showOwnShapes &&
00116                             (viewPtr != NULL) &&
00117                             IsViewIdSupported(viewId) &&
00118                             (m_shapesMap.find(providerPtr) == m_shapesMap.end())){
00119               Shapes& shapes = m_shapesMap[providerPtr];
00120 
00121               bool isBackground = ((flags & SF_BACKGROUND) != 0);
00122               CreateShapes(viewId, shapes);
00123 
00124               int shapesCount = shapes.GetCount();
00125               for (int i = 0; i < shapesCount; ++i){
00126                      iview::IShape* shapePtr = shapes.GetAt(i);
00127                      if (shapePtr != NULL){
00128                             // If the shape should be placed in the scene background
00129                             // and is not already a background shape, move it to inactive layer:
00130                             if (isBackground && (shapePtr->GetLayerType() != iview::IViewLayer::LT_BACKGROUND)){
00131                                    iview::CShapeBase* shapeImplPtr = dynamic_cast<iview::CShapeBase*>(shapePtr);
00132                                    if (shapeImplPtr != NULL){
00133                                           shapeImplPtr->AssignToLayer(iview::IViewLayer::LT_INACTIVE);
00134                                    }
00135                             }
00136 
00137                             viewPtr->ConnectShape(shapePtr);
00138                      }
00139               }
00140        }
00141 
00142        if (showSlaveShapes && m_slaveExtenderCompPtr.IsValid()){
00143               m_slaveExtenderCompPtr->AddItemsToScene(providerPtr, (flags | SF_BACKGROUND) & ~SF_DIRECT);
00144 
00145               m_isSlaveShown = true;
00146        }
00147        else{
00148               m_isSlaveShown = false;
00149        }
00150 }
00151 
00152 
00153 template <class Base>
00154 void TViewExtenderCompBase<Base>::RemoveItemsFromScene(IViewProvider* providerPtr)
00155 {
00156        Q_ASSERT(providerPtr != NULL);
00157 
00158        if (m_isSlaveShown){
00159               Q_ASSERT(m_slaveExtenderCompPtr.IsValid());
00160 
00161               m_slaveExtenderCompPtr->RemoveItemsFromScene(providerPtr);
00162        }
00163 
00164        ShapesMap::iterator iter = m_shapesMap.find(providerPtr);
00165        if (iter != m_shapesMap.end()){
00166               iview::IShapeView* viewPtr = providerPtr->GetView();
00167 
00168               if (viewPtr != NULL){
00169                      Shapes& shapes = iter.value();
00170 
00171                      int shapesCount = shapes.GetCount();
00172                      for (int i = 0; i < shapesCount; ++i){
00173                             iview::IShape* shapePtr = shapes.GetAt(i);
00174                             if (shapePtr != NULL){
00175                                    viewPtr->DisconnectShape(shapePtr);
00176                             }
00177                      }
00178               }
00179 
00180               m_shapesMap.erase(iter);
00181        }
00182 }

00187 template <class Base>
00188 bool TViewExtenderCompBase<Base>::IsViewIdSupported(int viewId) const
00189 {
00190        if (m_idFiltersAttrPtr.IsValid()){
00191               int filtersCount = m_idFiltersAttrPtr.GetCount();
00192               for (int i = 0; i < filtersCount; ++i){
00193                      int filterId = m_idFiltersAttrPtr[i];
00194                      if (viewId == filterId){
00195                             return true;
00196                      }
00197               }
00198 
00199               return false;
00200        }
00201 
00202        return true;
00203 }
00204

00206 template <class Base>
00207 const typename TViewExtenderCompBase<Base>::ShapesMap& TViewExtenderCompBase<Base>::GetShapesMap() const
00208 {
00209        return m_shapesMap;
00210 }

00213 template <class Base>
00214 void TViewExtenderCompBase<Base>::UpdateAllViews()
00215 {
00216        for (ShapesMap::iterator index = m_shapesMap.begin(); index != m_shapesMap.end(); index++){
00217               IViewProvider* viewProvderPtr = index.key();
00218               Q_ASSERT(viewProvderPtr != NULL);
00219 
00220               iview::IShapeView* viewPtr = viewProvderPtr->GetView();
00221               Q_ASSERT(viewPtr != NULL);
00222 
00223               viewPtr->Update();
00224        }
00225 }
